basics.name: Sydoruk Serhii
basics.label: Frontend Engineer
basics.summary:
Dynamic and detail-oriented Full Stack Developer with over 8 years of experience specializing in client-side programming. Proven track record in delivering diverse and complex web projects in sectors ranging from healthcare to political analytics and homeowner maintenance management systems.

 An effective team player in both large and small agile teams, with a knack for translating design team visions into pixel-perfect web formats, while adhering to responsive web design conventions.

 Passionate about keeping pace with the latest industry trends and advancements, and committed to continuous learning and professional growth.

 Driven by results, I am currently seeking opportunities to leverage my technical skills and passion to become a leading software engineer in a challenging and progressive environment.

work.name: Wix.com
work.summary: Wix.com Ltd. is an Israeli software company, providing cloud-based web development services. It allows users to create HTML5 websites and mobile sites through the use of online drag and drop tools. Key technologies used: TypeScript, React.js, Mobx, Redux.
highlights: Team Lead at Wix Groups FEDs
Engineer from FED infrastructure team (till Dec 2021)
Developer in Premium Domains FED squad (till Jan 2021)

work.name: Helsi
work.summary: Ukrainian health-care startup. Key technologies used: React, Redux, Redux Saga, Redux Form.

work.name: Cogniance
highlights: Web app for homeowners (the key technologies used: Angular 1.*, SCSS);
Chrome extension for Gmail (the key technologies used: InboxSDK, Backbone.js, SCSS);
CRM analytics web app (the key technologies used: React, Redux).

work.name: R&R Music Ltd
work.summary: The key technologies used: Ember.js, JavaScript, SCSS.
highlights: Development of Ember web app for music library catalog;

work.name: ZEO Alliance
work.summary: The key technology used: JavaScript, jQuery, SCSS, Less, HTML, HTML5, CSS, CSS3.
highlights: supporting and improving the company's indoor landing management system
work with HTML for in-app web views inside of the desktop application (MacKeeper)
implementation of new technologies (HTML5, CSS3, CSS frameworks, JavaScript frameworks)

work.name: Stanfy
work.summary: The key technologies used: Backbone.js, PhoneGap, JavaScript, jQuery, HTML, HTML5, CSS, CSS3.
highlights: Developed the hybrid mobile application on PhoneGap.js (iOS, Android)
Worked with the front-end part (WebViews) of mobile applications;

references.name: Sergey Moliavko
references.reference: Serhii is a great young specialist. One of those who has good knowledge, amazing desire to explore and implement new technologies. I've collaborated with Serhii as product owner and can recommend him as a great front-end developer with huge potential.

references.name: Anastasiia Voitova
references.reference: Serhii is a very innovative developer, who always followed the innovations in the industry and successfully applied them in practice. Self-organized and able to achieve the goals. Very friendly, good team player. It was a pleasure to work with him.

references.name: Anna Mininkova
references.reference: Serhii is highly professional HTML/CSS technician. We worked together on a few extremely challenging projects, that required continuous attention, constant engagement, commitment, and readiness to generate new ideas, and it proved to be an excellent collaboration. Serhii is especially attentive to details and is eager to try out new technologies and approaches, which makes him a great team member and contractor.
